channel.title: Setup Module Inputs on Terraform on AWS Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Setup Module Inputs on Terraform on AWS Workshop

item.title: Setup auto tfvars
item.description: Configure your tfvars file vi $HOME/terraform.tfvars Create a file that contains the inputs for the vpc module Setup module inputs AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID = "*********************" AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY = "*********************" tfe_organization = "the-org-name-you-created" tfe_email = "someone@companyx.com" region = "us-east-2" (replace *** with AKEY and SKEY) !!!!CAUTION!!!!: In production this method of input is not recommended %
